verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's lawyers [V: are] preparing for a legal showdown with special counsel Robert Mueller , according to sources familiar with their thinking .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's lawyers] are [V: preparing] [ARG2: for a legal showdown with special counsel Robert Mueller] , according to sources familiar with their thinking .
President Donald Trump 's lawyers are preparing for a legal showdown with special counsel Robert Mueller , [V: according] to sources familiar with their thinking .
